directions.d: Add one tablespoon of butter into a skillet.
Heat butter over a medium heat till melted and add a slice of bread.
Brown the bread on one side and remove bread from skillet.
Repeat the above steps for the other slice of bread.
Add cheese slices in between browned sides.
Once again, for each side of the grilled cheese:
Add 1 tablespoon of butter into skillet and melt.
Brown outside side of bread on grilled cheese
